Package a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number

Class AttackingSpell

Object
Spell
AttackingSpell
public class AttackingSpell extends Spell
Magic spells that do some sort of damage to a target

  • Field Details

    • type

      private boolean type
      Defines, if HP or MP is affected.

      type == true: affects HP

      type == false: affects MP

    • percentage

      private boolean percentage
      Defines, if amount is interpreted as an absolute value or as a percentage.

      percentage == true: deduct value to subtract as 'amount' percentage of basic value

      percentage == false: subtract amount directly

    • amount

      private int amount
      Has to be non negative.

      if percentage==true, amount must be in the interval [0,100]

  • Constructor Details

    • AttackingSpell

      public AttackingSpell(String name, int manaCost, MagicLevel levelNeeded, boolean type, boolean percentage, int amount)
      Parameters:
      name - name
      manaCost - manaCost
      levelNeeded - levelNeeded
      type - defines if health or mana is affected
      percentage - defines if amount is an absolute or a percentage value
      amount - amount

  • Method Details

    • doEffect

      public void doEffect(MagicEffectRealization target)
      If the target is protected against this spell (isProtected), then protection against exactly this spell is removed (removeProtection). Otherwise use one of the functions takeDamage, takeDamagePercent, weakenMagic or weakenMagicPercent on target according to the flags type and percentage.
      Specified by:
      doEffect in class Spell
      Parameters:
      target - target that takes the damage

    • additionalOutputString

      public String additionalOutputString()
      Returns "; -'amount' 'percentage' 'HPorMP'". where 'percentage' is a '%'-sign if percentage is true, empty otherwise and HPorMP is HP if type is true, MP otherwise. E. g. "; -10 MP" or "; -50 % HP"
      Overrides:
      additionalOutputString in class Spell
      Returns:
      "; -'amount' 'percentage' 'HPorMP'".
